name: Mattress
description: 3 generation family where elderly client recently stopped working due to bad leg due to a hit-and-run and daughter is hospitalised for cancer/stroke. The current mattress in the flat had been thrown away during a home cleaning as they were not hygienic.

passiton.name: Super Single Mattress and Frame
passiton.description: Super single bed with plush topper and supporting bed frame. Very lightly used for out of town visitors 2-3x a year.

passiton.name: Queen size orthopaedic mattress
passiton.description:
I have a very new queen-size mattress in perfect condition. It's an expensive orthopaedic hybrid mattress with pocket springs, middle layer of memory foam, and top layer of 100% pure latex. I bought it on 21 Oct 2025. I'm giving away because I'm moving house and want to downsize to a smaller bed and mattress. I considered selling on Carousell but decided to donate to a needy family.

 

I will donate: 

1. Mattress (new condition)

1a. Warranty card & receipt for mattress (10-yr warranty)

2. Mattress protector

3. Bedsheet

4. Pillow (very good condition)

5. Pillow protector

6. 2x Pillow cases

7. Bolster case

name: Queen bed
description: Family consists of two young parents and their preschool going children, living in a 2-room rental flat. Both parents are working but their low income hinders them from having extra money for a new bed. They require a queen sized bed with mattress for the family to sleep in, preferably with storage space below the mattress. Please Whatsapp me at 62319407 if you have a suitable one to donate, thank you!

name: Diapers
description: Client has 5 children, age 5, 4, 2, 1 years old and 22 days old. Client has been unemployed since birth of first child. Husband is on unpaid leave in order to support caregiving of children since client just gave birth, hence, is unable to receive his daily pay. Family is currently pending approval for financial assistance. Family hopes for urgent support of a few tins of Abbott Similac Gain 5MO Growing-up Milk Stage 3, a few packets of Huggies Pants L and Huggies Pants XXL. Kindly contact/WhatsApp me at 98598768 for further liaison, thank you!

name: Oven
description:
Client is on long-term MC for 6 months, husband is the only sole breadwinner. The family consist of 8 members with 6 school-going children aged between 6 to 14. 
The family is currently receiving insufficient finance support. Client's husband employment is unstable and he is currently employed on a contract ad-hoc basis, with subsequent reviews to ascertain whether he can continue his employment. 
Client is currently receiving counselling and emotional support with regard to other psychosocial, emotional issues eg parenting, caregiving and stress management to assist her to cope with the current systemic stressors from various areas. Client request for a oven to bake cookies as she has just started home baking, this is to supplement her income and financial needs and also contributes to her sense of efficacy and sense of self.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Cornell Oven Toaster
passiton.description: Model CT-25W. 700W. 9 litre capacity. Useful for toasting bread and reheating pastries. Top and bottom heating element. Well-used, working condition. Small dent on the back panel.
